column5: Here are some of the highlights this year.....the perch picture we caught 111 perch and kept 89 big ones......my best day on the water for perch ever!  Walleye and perch fishing on Lake Erie plus my vacation with OFC GtG..........
Lots of good perch reports coming out. Nice haul. The BOQ has got to be the best walleye fishery in south Ont. Big lake, big fish.
thanks rod caster i have a 16lb eye from boq awesome place for big fish
Incredible! haha makes me giddy just thinking about it.
Now that is a mess of perch!!!
That's a haul in a half of perchs    Congrats corvy Thanks for sharing your year end review.... enjoyed watching those videos Jacques
Great report and great vids. The sound and picture is very crisp!
